The Indonesian: language caption in the post translates to English as a statement made by Prof. Tokuda claiming that the opposition candidate, Prabowo, won the 2019 Indonesian presidential election with 61% of the vote, defeating the incumbent President Jokowi.
The claim includes a hashtag: PrabowoWithoutDick2019, at the end of the document shared by Prof. Tokuda.
The claim mentions that Prof: Tokuda, an 84-year-old democracy expert from Japan, wants to help Indonesia avoid colonization by China and has a personal connection to Indonesia due to his grandparents' history of colonization in the country.
